author: baxter30
title: Blockchain Learning Center
description: People need access to high quality information about blockchain technology. Fun approachable ways to learn are hard to find.
solution: Provide a community learning center attached to a crypto positive coffee shop that offer demos and classes covering a wide range of topics.
experience: I'm a front end engineer and I have been a barista in the past. I have been inspired by the passion of the cardano community!
